scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:AppealQueue_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_language.GetResource('awaiting_review_instructions') $core_v2_language.GetResource('possibly_abusive_instructions') $core_v2_language.GetResource('in_abuse_queue_instructions')

#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.appealQueue') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="abuse_reports">Abuse Reports for {0}</resource> <resource name="Accept">Approve</resource> <resource name="Accepted">Approved</resource> <resource name="AcceptedMessage">This appeal was approved.</resource> <resource name="action">Action</resource> <resource name="action_approve">Approved</resource> <resource name="action_create">Created</resource> <resource name="action_delete">Deleted</resource> <resource name="action_deny">Denied</resource> <resource name="action_publish">Published</resource> <resource name="action_update">Edited</resource> <resource name="AppealQueue_Description">Enables actions to be taken on moderated and abusive content.</resource> <resource name="AppealQueue_Name">Moderation Queue</resource> <resource name="Appeals">Number of appeals</resource> <resource name="AppealsAccepted">Number of approvals after appeals</resource> <resource name="AppealsOpen">Number of open appeals</resource> <resource name="Application">{0} (in {1})</resource> <resource name="ApproveFormInstructions">To approve, please complete the following approval form.</resource> <resource name="author">{0}</resource> <resource name="author_placeholder">By author...</resource> <resource name="author_with_username">{0} ({1})</resource> <resource name="AuthorDetails">Author Details</resource> <resource name="AuthorNotFound">The author could not be found.</resource> <resource name="AuthorRespondedMessage">The author responded on {0}.</resource> <resource name="AuthorsResponse">Author's Response</resource> <resource name="awaiting_review">Requires Review</resource> <resource name="awaiting_review_instructions">Content in this list requires your review and is currently not visible in the community. Approve or deny each item. Note that users flagged as abusive can still login and participate in the community but all of their content will be flagged as abusive and will not be visible.</resource> <resource name="BoardAcceptedMessage">Approved by {0} on {1}</resource> <resource name="BoardRejectedMessage">Denied by {0} on {1}</resource> <resource name="BoardResponse">Moderator Message</resource> <resource name="BoardResponse_Description">This message will be included with the approval/denial message to the author regarding this {0}.</resource> <resource name="BoardResponseLabel">Explain your decision...</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="CancelEditing">Cancel Editing</resource> <resource name="ConfirmUserDeletion">Are you sure you want to delete {0}?</resource> <resource name="ConfirmUserDeletionDetail">Deleting this user will remove all the content authored by the user. The content is provided below for review.</resource> <resource name="Container">{0}</resource> <resource name="ContentFlaggedBy">Reported By</resource> <resource name="ContentTitleNotAvailable">(Title Not Available)</resource> <resource name="ContextLookUp_NoMatches">No matching applications or groups were found.</resource> <resource name="ContextLookUp_Placeholder">In group or application...</resource> <resource name="CurrentRoles">Current roles</resource> <resource name="date">Date</resource> <resource name="DefinitelyAbusiveMessage">The community is certain that this {0} is abusive, however the minimum number of abuse reports required to automatically deny on this {0} have not been received.</resource> <resource name="delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="delete_author">Delete Author</resource> <resource name="delete_user">Delete User</resource> <resource name="DeleteConfirmation">Are you sure you want to bypass the review workflow and delete this immediately?</resource> <resource name="Deleted">Deleted</resource> <resource name="Denied">Denied</resource> <resource name="DenyFormInstructions">To deny, please complete the following denial form.</resource> <resource name="Edit">Edit</resource> <resource name="EditedContent">{0}</resource> <resource name="EmptyContent">This content has no additional information available</resource> <resource name="ExpiredMessage">This appeal has expired. The {1} has been denied since {0}.</resource> <resource name="ExpungeMessage">The {1} will be expunged {0}.</resource> <resource name="FileContent_Instructions">The following files are referenced by this {0} for review.</resource> <resource name="FileContent_Plural">{0} Files</resource> <resource name="FileContent_Singular">{0} File</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_Accepted">Approved</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_AllReviewable">Moderated, Review Required, or Appealed</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_AuthorResponded">Appealed</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_Expired">Expired</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_Initiated">Awaiting Appeal</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_ModerationRequired">Moderated</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_PendingReview">Pending Review</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_Rejected">Denied</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_Reported">Reported</resource> <resource name="FilterAppealState_ReviewRequired">Review Required</resource> <resource name="FilterBy_AllTime">For Any Date</resource> <resource name="FilterBy_LastDay">In Last Day</resource> <resource name="FilterBy_LastMonth">In Last 30 Days</resource> <resource name="FilterBy_LastWeek">In Last 7 Days</resource> <resource name="FilterContentType_All">Any Content</resource> <resource name="FilterContentType_ContentType">Any {0}</resource> <resource name="HideContent">Deny</resource> <resource name="History">Review History</resource> <resource name="IgnoreContent">Ignore</resource> <resource name="in_abuse_queue">In Process</resource> <resource name="in_abuse_queue_instructions">Content in this list is currently in an abuse, moderation, or review workflow but does not currently require your review.
